name: 100 Sprint - Brazil Summer Games
description:
Head to Brazil and race the 100 metre sprint! Run faster than your opponents to win the gold! Compete with challengers from around the world to earn your medal and take your place on the heroic podium.

Tap as fast as you can to dash across the track. Outrun and outpace your sporty rivals, but don’t fall or your dream will be over!

- Run the 100m sprint!
- Compete in the summer games!
- Race against multiple opponents!
- Many tracks in the running championship!
